# automaticDimension

**Type Property**

The default value to apply to a dimension.

## Declaration

```swift
class let automaticDimension: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

Use this constant with any sizing-related [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController] property to get the default system behavior.

## Managing Sidebars

- **toggleSidebar(_:)**: Collapses or expands the first sidebar in the split view controller using an animation.
- **minimumThicknessForInlineSidebars**: The minimum thickness for a sidebar before it automatically collapses.
